bug.author: e-aakash
bug.summary: Man page not found for 3 functions in command-line program reference page
bug.description: The man page of <denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_allknn.html>mlpack_allknn</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_allkfn.html>mlpack_allkfn</denchmark-link> and <denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_allkrann.html>mlpack_allkrann</denchmark-link> are displaying 404 Not found in <denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man.html>command-line program reference page</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment:
Right, thank you! These three were removed in mlpack 3.0.0, and the names are now mlpack_knn, mlpack_kfn, and mlpack_krann. I've updated all four corresponding documentation pages, and the documentation for those three command-line programs would be these links: <denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_knn.html>https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_knn.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_kfn.html>https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_kfn.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_krann.html>https://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-3.0.3/man/mlpack_krann.html</denchmark-link>
Sorry for the inconvenience, but thank you for the report! üëç
